name: 3D Bike Cyclone
description:
*** New Racing Game Star! ***

Being a bike rider is everyone's dream. Now you can drive your bike through amazing tracks.
You can drive your bike with jumps and loops in this simple and fast-paced physics-based game.

Tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate/brake.

Features:
- Single mode
- Simple controls
- All levels and Worlds already unlocked
- 30 challenging tracks
- Touch to accelerate, tilt to lean the bike

Privacy Policy: http://www.freemanapp.com/?page_id=17
